main_definition: A movie, also known as a film or motion picture, is a recorded sequence of images displayed rapidly to create the illusion of movement. It usually tells a story through visual and auditory elements.

meanings_and_examples.example: The movie we watched last night was a thrilling action adventure.
I love going to the cinema and watching movies on the big screen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An individual item from a series of recorded images intended for viewing
meanings_and_examples.example: The latest episode of my favorite TV show is available as a movie download.
